content: दलः --लं [दल्-अच्] {@--1@} ({%a%}) A piece, portion, part, fragment; <ls>Śi. 4. 44.</ls> ({%b%}) A piece torn or split off. ({%c%}) Tearing, cutting. {@--2@} A degree. {@--3@} A half, the half. {@--4@} A sheath, scabbard. {@--5@} A small shoot or blade, a petal, leaf; <ls>R. 4. 42</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 21</ls>, <ls n="Ś. 3.">22.</ls> {@--6@} The blade of any weapon. {@--7@} A clump, heap, quantity. {@--8@} A detachment, a body of troops. {@--9@} Alloy or adulteration.
